body.name: Pyrex Deep 2-Piece 9.5" Glass Baking Dish Set, Glass Bakeware Set, Dishwasher, Microwave, Freezer and Pre-Heated Oven Safe, Deep & Easy Grab

features: 2-PIECE SET: Includes (1) Deep 9.5" Round Glass Pie Baking Dish (1) Easy Grab 9.5" Glass Pie Baking Dish. These deep baking dishes are the essentials to have in any kitchen as they are versatile in use from prepping to baking the perfect pies and desserts!

GO DEEPER: The Deep 9.5" Round Baking Dish (non-flutted) offers up to 60% percent deeper than the Pyrex Basic and Easy Grab pie dishes you know and love. With this set, there’s more room to get creative. Deeper size stops spillovers, and more importantly, holds more of the good stuff for your parties and gatherings.

CLASSIC DESIGNS: The Easy Grab Glass Pie Plate feature the classic flute wave-pattern rims for easy grabbing and a stylistic hint. The Deep Glass Pie Plate (non-fluted) features wide handles to easily move from oven to table. With these high-quality glass and simple designs, this set adds a bit of tradition and style to the table.
OVEN/FREEZER SAFE: Made with tempered glass, this set is made to go directly into a preheated oven, heating evenly for consistent results. Also perfect for no-bake and freezer pies!

PYREX IS THE #1 BRAND OF GLASS BAKEWARE*: Loved for generations, experienced cooks and beginners alike have reached for Pyrex brand glassware products, because they’re affordable, durable, and great for all their cooking, serving and storing needs. Source: The NPD Group / Retail Tracking Service, dollars and units, 12 ME December 2022
body.description: Craft pie perfection with two versatile, highperformance glass pie plates that deliver the perfect upgrade to your beloved baked classics. Choose the Easy Grab® Pie Plate for traditional favorites, from sweet to savory pies, quiches and more. The large, fluted edge enhances your grip for easier lifting, and doubles as a guide for beautiful, fluted crusts. Our Deep Pie Plate is 60% deeper* with wide handles, perfect when your recipe calls for more layers, and easily moves from oven to table. Tempered Pyrex® glass can go directly into a preheated oven, heating evenly for consistent results. Also perfect for no-bake and freezer pies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful set at a great price
reviews.reviewText: You can’t go wrong with Pyrex. These are larger than average pie plates, which is what I was looking for. The price for the set of 2 was very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I never knew about the deeper size
reviews.reviewText: I needed a pie plate and quickly. The options on Amazon were vast but a bit pricier than what I was seeing at Home Goods. I wanted a glass pie dish and the store I was at only had the fancy enamel ones for $10. So I assumed a plain glass one would be available at a good price. I found this combo 2 pack offering to be the closest to what I wanted and it came out to about $10 each. I was desperate as I needed more pie plates for holiday pies.The standard dish is just that. Reliable Pyrex pie plate like the ones I already had. The surprise was the extra deep pie dish. Wow! At first I was frustrated as that dish was not a great option for a pumpkin pie.It has been 2 months since I got this combo pack and only used the standard plate once for a pie. I have used the deep dish several times for many reasons. It is amazing and I never would have thought of it. I baked pasta and veggie dishes with it. It is a great bake to serve option. Wow a deep dish quiche.... yeess. I am so happy I picked this and really I did because of the price point. Other sellers wanted up to $20 for a Pyrex clear glass plate. Silly.Classic product with good quality and a surprise size you did not know you needed in your life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect pie pans
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, easy to clean cooks evenly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect deep dish pie pan
reviews.reviewText: I bought this combo for the extra deep dish pie pan. I make berry pie most of the summer. This pie pan is perfect. It's deep enough that it never boils over. And the pies come out 2-3 inches thick. It's perfect. If you love pie, this is the pan.Summer pie recipe:Put a crust into your pan, prebake crust so it comes out flakey. An easy way to do this is to put the crust in the pan, poke the crust all over with a fork, then put parchment paper over the crust, and pour beans or rice onto the paper to fill the pie pan. (Some people use pie weights, but this works if you don't have weights) Bake for ten-fifteen minutes. Pull the parchment paper and beans out of the pan.Note: If you don't fill the pie crust with weights or the parchment paper and rice combo before you bake, the crust will shrink and end up at the bottom of the pan.I take a mixture of frozen peaches, cherries, blueberries, strawberries, pineapple, raspberries, and blackberries and place then in a large pot. Set to low.Squeeze an entire lemon over the berries. Throw a tiny bit of vanilla in there, a tea spoon of ground ginger, and a couple dashes of cinnamon.Add 3/4 cup of sugar and stir gently.Once it's soupy stir in a 1/4 cup of corn starch.Pour contents into your pie pan and bake at 375 for 65 minutes.Let cool completely (3-4 hours). If you don't let it cool, it'll be runny.
